markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ecology of the Sahkils](/Articles.aspx?ID=33)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 60

The vile [sahkils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=208) scheme from the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9), stoking mortal fears and driving their prey to ruin. Peer through the mists to see the terrifying truths of the sahkils!
name: Ecology of the Sahkils
primary_source: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege pg. 60
